MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Broompark Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.36am. Our engineers are on their way to the substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.45am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.57am on Monday 29th March 2021.
